verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
This month <WH2320> shall be unto you the beginning <WH7218> of months <WH2320>: it shall be the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> of the year <WH8141> to you.

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> ye unto all the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, In the tenth <WH6218> day of this month <WH2320> they shall take <WH3947> <WH8799> to them every man <WH376> a lamb <WH7716>, according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, a lamb <WH7716> for an house <WH1004>:

And if the household <WH1004> be <WH1961> <WH8800> too little <WH4591> <WH8799> for the lamb <WH7716>, let him and his neighbour <WH7934> next <WH7138> unto his house <WH1004> take <WH3947> <WH8804> it according to the number <WH4373> of the souls <WH5315>; every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400> shall make your count <WH3699> <WH8799> for the lamb <WH7716>.
Your lamb <WH7716> shall be without blemish <WH8549>, a male <WH2145> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141>: ye shall take <WH3947> <WH8799> it out from the sheep <WH3532>, or from the goats <WH5795>:

And ye shall keep <WH4931> it up until the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the same month <WH2320>: and the whole <WH3605> assembly <WH6951> of the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall kill <WH7819> <WH8804> it in <WH996> the evening <WH6153>.

And they shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the blood <WH1818>, and strike <WH5414> <WH8804> it on the two <WH8147> side posts <WH4201> and on the upper door post <WH4947> of the houses <WH1004>, wherein they shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> it.

And they shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> the flesh <WH1320> in that night <WH3915>, roast <WH6748> with fire <WH784>, and matzah <WH4682>; and with bitter <WH4844> herbs they shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> it.

Eat <WH398> <WH8799> not of it raw <WH4995>, nor sodden <WH1310> <WH8794> <WH1311> at all with water <WH4325>, but roast <WH6748> with fire <WH784>; his head <WH7218> with his legs <WH3767>, and with the purtenance <WH7130> thereof.

And ye shall let nothing of it remain <WH3498> <WH8686> until the morning <WH1242>; and that which remaineth <WH3498> <WH8737> of it until the morning <WH1242> ye shall burn <WH8313> <WH8799> with fire <WH784>.

And thus <WH3602> shall ye eat <WH398> <WH8799> it; with your loins <WH4975> girded <WH2296> <WH8803>, your shoes <WH5275> on your feet <WH7272>, and your staff <WH4731> in your hand <WH3027>; and ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> it in haste <WH2649>: it is the YY'S <WH3068> passover <WH6453>.

For I will pass <WH5674> <WH8804> through the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> this night <WH3915>, and will smite <WH5221> <WH8689> all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, both man <WH120> and beast <WH929>; and against all the 'elohim <WH430> of Egypt <WH4714> I will execute <WH6213> <WH8799> judgment <WH8201>: I am the YY <WH3068>.

And the blood <WH1818> shall be to you for a token <WH226> upon the houses <WH1004> where ye are: and when I see <WH7200> <WH8804> the blood <WH1818>, I will pass <WH6452> <WH8804> over you, and the plague <WH5063> shall not be upon you to destroy <WH4889> you, when I smite <WH5221> <WH8687> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And this day <WH3117> shall be unto you for a memorial <WH2146>; and ye shall keep <WH2287> <WH8804> it a feast <WH2282> to the YY <WH3068> throughout your generations <WH1755>; ye shall keep it a feast <WH2287> <WH8799> by an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall ye eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682>; even <WH389> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> ye shall put away <WH7673> <WH8686> leaven <WH7603> out of your houses <WH1004>: for whosoever eateth <WH398> <WH8802> leavened bread <WH2557> from the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> until the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> <WH8738> off from Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And in the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> there shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>, and in the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> there shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you; no manner of work <WH4399> shall be done <WH6213> <WH8735> in them, save <WH389> that which every man <WH5315> must eat <WH398> <WH8735>, that only may be done <WH6213> <WH8735> of you.

And ye shall observe <WH8104> <WH8804> the feast of matzah <WH4682>; for in this selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117> have I brought <WH3318> <WH8689> your armies <WH6635> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: therefore shall ye observe <WH8104> <WH8804> this day <WH3117> in your generations <WH1755> by an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769>.

In the first <WH7223> month, on the fourteenth <WH6240> <WH702> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153>, ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682>, until the one <WH259> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall there be no leaven <WH7603> found <WH4672> <WH8735> in your houses <WH1004>: for whosoever eateth <WH398> <WH8802> that which is leavened <WH2556> <WH8688>, even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, whether he be a stranger <WH1616>, or born <WH249> in the land <WH776>.
Ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> nothing leavened <WH2556> <WH8688>; in all your habitations <WH4186> shall ye eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682>.

Then Mosheh <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for all the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Draw out <WH4900> <WH8798> and take <WH3947> <WH8798> you a lamb <WH6629> according to your families <WH4940>, and kill <WH7819> <WH8798> the passover <WH6453>.

And ye shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> a bunch <WH92> of hyssop <WH231>, and dip <WH2881> <WH8804> it in the blood <WH1818> that is in the bason <WH5592>, and strike <WH5060> <WH8689> the lintel <WH4947> and the two <WH8147> side posts <WH4201> with the blood <WH1818> that is in the bason <WH5592>; and none <WH376> of you shall go out <WH3318> <WH8799> at the door <WH6607> of his house <WH1004> until the morning <WH1242>.

For the YY <WH3068> will pass through <WH5674> <WH8804> to smite <WH5062> <WH8800> the Egyptians <WH4714>; and when he seeth <WH7200> <WH8804> the blood <WH1818> upon the lintel <WH4947>, and on the two <WH8147> side posts <WH4201>, the YY <WH3068> will pass over <WH6452> <WH8804> the door <WH6607>, and will not suffer <WH5414> <WH8799> the destroyer <WH7843> <WH8688> to come <WH935> <WH8800> in unto your houses <WH1004> to smite <WH5062> <WH8800> you.
And ye shall observe <WH8104> <WH8804> this thing <WH1697> for an ordinance <WH2706> to thee and to thy sons <WH1121> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.

And it shall come to pass, when ye be come <WH935> <WH8799> to the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> will give <WH5414> <WH8799> you, according as he hath promised <WH1696> <WH8765>, that ye shall keep <WH8104> <WH8804> this service <WH5656>.
And it shall come to pass, when your children <WH1121> shall say <WH559> <WH8799> unto you, What mean ye by this service <WH5656> ?

That ye shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, It is the sacrifice <WH2077> of the YY'S <WH3068> passover <WH6453>, who passed <WH6452> <WH8804> over the houses <WH1004> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in Egypt <WH4714>, when he smote <WH5062> <WH8800> the Egyptians <WH4714>, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> our houses <WH1004>. And the people <WH5971> bowed the head <WH6915> <WH8799> and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went away <WH3212> <WH8799>, and did <WH6213> <WH8799> as the YY <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, so did <WH6213> <WH8804> they.

And it came to pass, that at midnight <WH2677> <WH3915> the YY <WH3068> smote <WH5221> <WH8689> all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the firstborn <WH1060> of Pharaoh <WH6547> that sat <WH3427> <WH8802> on his throne <WH3678> unto the firstborn <WH1060> of the captive <WH7628> that was in the dungeon <WH1004> <WH953>; and all the firstborn <WH1060> of cattle <WH929>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> in the night <WH3915>, he, and all his servants <WH5650>, and all the Egyptians <WH4714>; and there was a great <WH1419> cry <WH6818> in Egypt <WH4714>; for there was not a house <WH1004> where there was not one dead <WH4191> <WH8801>.

And he called <WH7121> <WH8799> for Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> by night <WH3915>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Rise up <WH6965> <WH8798>, and get you forth <WH3318> <WH8798> from among <WH8432> my people <WH5971>, both ye and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and go <WH3212> <WH8798>, serve <WH5647> <WH8798> the YY <WH3068>, as ye have said <WH1696> <WH8763>.
Also take <WH3947> <WH8798> your flocks <WH6629> and your herds <WH1241>, as ye have said <WH1696> <WH8765>, and be gone <WH3212> <WH8798>; and bless <WH1288> <WH8765> me also.

And the Egyptians <WH4714> were urgent <WH2388> <WH8799> upon the people <WH5971>, that they might send <WH7971> <WH8763> them out of the land <WH776> in haste <WH4116> <WH8763>; for they said <WH559> <WH8804>, We be all dead <WH4191> <WH8801> men.

And the people <WH5971> took <WH5375> <WH8799> their dough <WH1217> before it was leavened <WH2556> <WH8799>, their kneadingtroughs <WH4863> being bound up <WH6887> <WH8803> in their clothes <WH8071> upon their shoulders <WH7926>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8804> according to the word <WH1697> of Mosheh <WH4872>; and they borrowed <WH7592> <WH8799> of the Egyptians <WH4714> jewels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, and jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, and raiment <WH8071>:

And the YY <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> the people <WH5971> favour <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, so that they lent <WH7592> <WH8686> unto them such things as they required. And they spoiled <WH5337> <WH8762> the Egyptians <WH4714>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799> from Rameses <WH7486> to Sukkot <WH5523>, about six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> on foot <WH7273> that were men <WH1397>, beside <WH905> children <WH2945>.
And a mixed <WH6154> multitude <WH7227> went up <WH5927> <WH8804> also with them; and flocks <WH6629>, and herds <WH1241>, even very <WH3966> much <WH3515> cattle <WH4735>.

And they baked <WH644> <WH8799> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH5692> of the dough <WH1217> which they brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714>, for it was not leavened <WH2556> <WH8804>; because they were thrust out <WH1644> <WH8795> of Egypt <WH4714>, and could <WH3201> <WH8804> not tarry <WH4102> <WH8699>, neither had they prepared <WH6213> <WH8804> for themselves any victual <WH6720>.

Now the sojourning <WH4186> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, who dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> in Egypt <WH4714>, was four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7093> of the four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>, even the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117> it came to pass, that all the hosts <WH6635> of the YY <WH3068> went out <WH3318> <WH8804> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

It is a night <WH3915> to be much observed <WH8107> unto the YY <WH3068> for bringing <WH3318> <WH8687> them out from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: this is that night <WH3915> of the YY <WH3068> to be observed <WH8107> of all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in their generations <WH1755>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, This is the ordinance <WH2708> of the passover <WH6453>: There shall no stranger <WH1121> <WH5236> eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof:
But every man's <WH376> servant <WH5650> that is bought <WH4736> for money <WH3701>, when thou hast circumcised <WH4135> <WH8804> him, then shall he eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof.
A foreigner <WH8453> and an hired servant <WH7916> shall not eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof.

In one <WH259> house <WH1004> shall it be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>; thou shalt not carry forth <WH3318> <WH8686> ought of the flesh <WH1320> abroad <WH2351> out of the house <WH1004>; neither shall ye break <WH7665> <WH8799> a bone <WH6106> thereof.
All the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall keep <WH6213> <WH8799> it.

And when a stranger <WH1616> shall sojourn <WH1481> <WH8799> with thee, and will keep <WH6213> <WH8804> the passover <WH6453> to the YY <WH3068>, let all his males <WH2145> be circumcised <WH4135> <WH8736>, and then let him come near <WH7126> <WH8799> and keep <WH6213> <WH8800> it; and he shall be as one that is born <WH249> in the land <WH776>: for no uncircumcised person <WH6189> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof.
One <WH259> Torah <WH8451> shall be to him that is homeborn <WH249>, and unto the stranger <WH1616> that sojourneth <WH1481> <WH8802> among <WH8432> you.
Thus did <WH6213> <WH8799> all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, so did <WH6213> <WH8804> they.

And it came to pass the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117>, that the YY <WH3068> did bring <WH3318> <WH8689> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by their armies <WH6635>.
